manifest.name: bail

scripts.build: npm run build-md && npm run build-bundle && npm run build-mangle
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test-coverage

manifest.readme:
# bail [![Build Status][travis-badge]][travis] [![Coverage Status][codecov-badge]][codecov]

:warning: Throw a given error.

## Installation

[npm][npm-install]:

```bash
npm install bail
```

## Usage

```js
var bail = require('bail');

bail();

bail(new Error('failure'));
// Error: failure
//     at repl:1:6
//     at REPLServer.defaultEval (repl.js:154:27)
//     ...
```

## API

### `bail([err])`

Throw a given error.

###### Parameters

*   `err` (`Error?`) — Optional error.

###### Throws

*   `Error` — Given error, if any.

## Related

*   [`noop`][noop]
*   [`noop2`][noop2]
*   [`noop3`][noop3]

## License

[MIT][license] © [Titus Wormer][author]
